description: A platform developed from an open framework to help AI researchers and developers to rapidly prototype, test and deploy workflows that include machine learning models as worker components. The workflow can be invoked on command line or web service, as well as integrated into UX/UI as part of a larger intelligent solution.
DistroML is an enterprise-grade distributed machine learning training framework designed to accelerate deep learning workflows across multiple GPUs, nodes, and cloud environments.
A Web Application for an Machine Learning implementation of CADEMAS framework

A general-purpose, domain-agnostic MLOps framework that automates the complete machine learning lifecycle from data versioning to model deployment and monitoring. Built with open-source tools to avoid vendor lock-in and enable reproducible ML workflows.
ML.NET is an open source and cross-platform machine learning framework for .NET.
Folax (Finite Operator Learning with JAX) is a framework for solving and optimizing PDEs by integrating machine learning with numerical methods in computational mechanics.
Open Machine Learning Compiler Framework

Built a machine learning pipeline to predict social media post virality using an imbalanced binary classification framework. Applied one-hot encoding, datetime feature extraction, and hashtag vectorization with leakage-safe traintest splitting. Evaluated Logistic Regression, KNN, and Decision Tree models using F1-score,precision,recall.
A Portable, Generalizable Machine Learning Framework for Long-Term Student Dropout Prediction

This project is a comprehensive framework for detecting network anomalies (specifically DoS/SYN Flooding) in IoT environments. It leverages Software-Defined Networking (SDN) for traffic monitoring and a K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) machine learning model to improve detection accuracy and false alarm reduction

Machine learningbased inverse kinematics pipeline for robotic manipulators. The project uses neural networks, forward kinematicsaware loss functions, and joint constraints to predict joint angles from end-effector poses. Designed as a modular and research-oriented framework.
Astronomical machine learning framework with advanced data analysis and interactive 3D visualization capabilities.

An end-to-end machine learning framework for detecting cyberattacks in smart traffic/IoT networks using optimized Random Forest models with SHAP and LIME explainability. Includes full preprocessing, training, validation protocol, evaluation, and Google Colab compatibility with Drive integration.

A graph-based machine learning framework for Aadhaar data analytics focused on regional coverage assessment, location-change anomaly detection, duplicate identity detection, and interactive dashboard visualization for governance and fraud prevention.

This project proposes a predictive data-driven framework to forecast restaurant health inspection scores and identify establishments at higher risk of violations using machine learning models using the San Francisco Health Inspection Scores (2024-current) dataset as a baseline
A network automation framework for Cisco iOS device splitting and monitoring with an integrated machine learning algorithm

Bioinformatics and Machine Learning framework for in silico prediction of candidiasis-related microRNAs. Includes data processing, feature engineering, and ML models for miRNA-disease association prediction.
This repository contains the supplementary materials for the paper: Machine Learning Framework for Speech Intelligibility Prediction using Binaural Room Impulse Responses (Alfian et al., 2026)
A machine learning framework using active learning strategies to accelerate the design of BCC solid solution high-entropy alloys
DeepGNN is a framework for training machine learning models on large scale graph data.

A machine learning framework that forecasts student performance by analyzing habits like attendance and study hours. Using an XGBoost classifier, it identifies patterns to predict grades and flag "at-risk" students early. This serves as an intelligent warning system, allowing educators to provide targeted support before final exams.
Prescriptive Machine Learning framework for analyzing Aadhaar service delivery.
Open source machine learning framework to automate text- and voice-based conversations: NLU, dialogue management, connect to Slack, Facebook, and more - Create chatbots and voice assistants
AI-based Weather Forecasting System using Machine Learning (Random Forest) and Django web framework with real-time data integration.
This repository includes all the code developed during my in-depth exploration of machine learning and deep learning frameworks.

This repository contains the complete, end-to-end reproducible pipeline developed for the manuscript:  Integrated Machine Learning and CRISPR Scoring Framework for Prioritizing Therapeutic gRNAs Targeting TCF7L2 in Type 2 Diabetes.

RESTful API for vector similarity search. It uses the Python web framework FastAPI and a REDIS vector database.  This accelerates machine learning workflows that require vector similarity search using classification models.

A data miningbased heart disease prediction system developed under the Complex Engineering Problem (CEP) framework, combining supervised machine learning models with explainable AI (SHAP) to ensure transparent and interpretable healthcare predictions.

A collection of comprehensive data science projects that demonstrate practical skills in data analysis, machine learning, deep learning, NLP, SQL & NoSQL databases, big data frameworks, AWS tools, and real-world business problem solving. This portfolio highlights the full workflow of data science.
A Machine Learning framework having all the best practice

Hi there! I'm Waqar, a passionate Full Stack Developer, DevOps Engineer, and Machine Learning enthusiast currently exploring the world of Agentic AI. I specialize in building intelligent, scalable, and automated systems using modern tools and frameworks  from infrastructure to intelligent apps.
A Dual-Pipeline Machine Learning Framework for Automated Sleep Disorder Screening using Hybrid Resampling and Ensemble Learning.
Machine Learning framework for the MNIST dataset, built in Rust

CircumSpectrum is a flux-based framework that converts bulk and single-cell RNA-seq data into metabolic fingerprints using genome-scale models and machine learning. It includes RADAR, SOURIS, and CORALIE modules for reaction-level, cross-cohort, and multi-tier correlation analyses.

TinyTorch is a lightweight, educational machine learning framework implementing tensors, automatic differentiation, neural network layers, optimizers, and training utilities. It provides a step-by-step guide to building deep learning frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow, inspired by open-source courses from Harvard University.

Developed a prognostic framework leveraging machine learning algorithms for early and accurate prediction of multiple diseases. The model integrates patient health data and clinical parameters to enhance diagnostic precision and support preventive healthcare decisions.
The R code for A scalable Bayesian double machine learning framework for high dimensional causal estimation, with application to racial disproportionality assessment

The SMS Spam Collection is a public dataset of 5,574 labeled SMS messages for spam research. It has text and multivariate features, falls under computer science, and supports classification/clustering tasks.

An AI-driven, sustainable framework for early detection of eating disorder risk factors using behavioral, cognitive, and demographic data. The system applies machine learning with robust preprocessing, stratified cross-validation, and SHAP-based explainability to support transparent and reliable mental health risk assessment.
Digital Materials Discovery Framework -  Integrating Computational Materials Modelling, Digitalisation of Materials Data, Machine Learning and Semantics  for accelerated Discovery of Materials
A Python Framework for Multi-Agent Programming with Machine Learning
An inference server for your machine learning models, including support for multiple frameworks, multi-model serving and more

This study introduces a Machine Learning (ML)-assisted framework using X-ray Diffraction (XRD) data to predict the properties of antimicrobial nanoparticles. The Random Forest Regressor predicts crystallite size with 1.84 nm MAE, and the Random Forest Classifier identifies material phase with 99% accuracy.
MLForge is a production-grade Machine Learning & MLOps framework for building, training, testing, deploying, and monitoring ML systems end-to-end.
Hyrax - A framework for machine learning in astronomy
A curated list of tools, frameworks, platforms, and resources for Machine Learning Operations (MLOps).
Edge-integrated, context-aware frameworks now seamlessly weave machine learning insights into the fabric.

Machine learning framework for inflammation severity assessment using histopathology features, implementing GroupKFold cross-validation, Pipeline structure, feature selection, ensemble models, hyperparameter tuning, and SHAP-based interpretability for multi-class and binary classification tasks.
Machine learning framework for identifying high-energy coastal event deposits (Ph.D. Thesis Research).
Equitrain: A Unified Framework for Training and Fine-tuning Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
A machine learning framework for predicting hydrolytic degradation kinetics of biodegradable polyesters (PLA, PLGA, PCL, PGA) for biomedical implant applications.

A data-driven modeling and backtesting framework for NFL quarterback passing yards props. The project applies traditional machine-learning techniques and contextual feature engineering to estimate expected passing yards and evaluate sportsbook prop lines, with performance assessed using realistic historical backtesting.
ustom torch style machine learning framework with automatic differentiation implemented on numpy, allows build GANs, VAEs, etc.
Earth observation processing framework for machine learning in Python

AI vs. Human Text Detection Framework A machine learning benchmarking system designed to distinguish between AI-generated and human-written text in Bengali and English. It utilizes novel graph-based feature extraction, rigorous statistical validation, and multi-model benchmarking against state-of-the-art baselines like DetectGPT and Grover.

End-to-end machine learning project for customer churn prediction using a telecom dataset. The solution includes data cleaning, EDA, feature engineering, and model comparison. A cost-sensitive threshold optimization framework is applied to maximize churn recall and minimize business loss, demonstrating business-focused ML decision-making.
Creating a framework to run Machine Learning and Neural Network
An MLOps framework to package, deploy, monitor and manage thousands of production machine learning models

Symbolic-Interpretable-LLM-HAR is a research framework for Human Activity Recognition (HAR) that unifies symbolic and statistical sensor representations, classical interpretable machine-learning models, and Large Language Models (LLMs).

The project is focused on building an end-to-end machine learning pipeline for a house price prediction system.  The pipeline is developed using ZenML, a MLOps framework that helps in managing machine learning workflows, and MLflow, which is used for experiment tracking and model deployment.

An AI-driven unified framework is proposed for early prediction of major non-communicable diseases using clinical and medical imaging data. It combines advanced machine learning for structured data and deep learning for images, with explainable AI to ensure accurate, scalable, and interpretable clinical decision support.

This project proposes a data-driven Fraud & Misuse Risk Scoring Framework that uses analytical and machine learning techniques to:  Identify meaningful patterns, trends, and anomalies in Aadhaar enrolment and update data  Assign a risk score to entities such as enrolment centers, operators, or devices  Translate analytical outputs into clear

A machine learning-based system for detecting fraudulent financial transactions. This project analyzes transaction patterns, builds predictive models, and identifies anomalies with high accuracy while minimizing false positives, providing a research-driven framework for financial fraud detection
Predict football match outcomes using the W-5 Multi-Agent AI Consensus Framework, achieving high accuracy with a blend of AI and machine learning techniques.
This framework extends DEA by training ensemble machine learning models to predict DEA efficiency scores, enabling scalable, forward-looking efficiency analysis.
Self-optimizing AgentFlow orchestrates adaptive workflows, harnessing machine learning for intelligent auto-scaling and real-time performance optimization framework.

The proposed research study will develop a comprehensive end-to-end Ma- chine Learning (ML) system to mitigate analytical challenges posed by BRFSS data and ensure the overall rigor and repro- ducibility of the ML-based approach.

Genetic algorithmbased inverse design framework for discovering double perovskite oxides with target band gaps for photovoltaic applications. Integrates DFT-informed machine learning as a fast surrogate and validates top candidates using first-principles DFT calculations.
ytopt: machine-learning-based autotuning and hyperparameter optimization framework using Bayesian Optimization

Project ini bertujuan untuk melakukan analisis dan prediksi penyakit diabetes dengan memanfaatkan pendekatan Big Data dan Machine Learning menggunakan framework PySpark. Evaluasi model dilakukan menggunakan metrik performa seperti Accuracy dan AUC, sehingga diperoleh gambaran yang jelas mengenai kemampuan model dalam memprediksi risiko diabetes.
A data-driven framework for customer segmentation and early-risk prediction using transactional data, RFM analysis, and machine learning. This repository supports an academic research study.

Data Science Team AI Agent:  An advanced multi-agent system built with the Agno (formerly Phidata) framework and OpenAI. This team of specialized AI agents collaborates to automate the entire Data Science pipelinefrom raw data loading and exploratory data analysis (EDA) to automated machine learning (ML) modeling and visualization.
Explainable AI (XAI) framework designed to provide transparent, interpretable insights for both tabular and image-based machine learning models.
Machine learning, computer vision, statistics and general scientific computing for .NET

This project is a web based malware detection system developed using machine learning and the Streamlit framework. It analyzes uploaded files and predicts whether a file is safe or malware using a Random Forest model trained on Windows PE file features for academic demonstration purposes.
A machine learning framework classifying smoker status via bio-signals, benchmarking Random Forest against baseline models with 5-fold cross-validation.

This repository explores Machine Learning through projects, scripts, and tutorials. It covers data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment using frameworks like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, with applications in classification, regression, NLP, and computer vision.

Self-driving laboratory framework for autonomous drug discovery: closed-loop optimization, multi-instrument orchestration, ADMET prediction, and experimental design. Integrates robotics, analytics, and machine learning for hands-free pharmaceutical research workflows.
Clustering Exercice from "Machine Learning" subject in "Mster en Cincia de Dades" from Universitat de Girona (UdG). Teacher Marc Comas.
Machine learning framework for discovering potentially habitable exoplanets using astrophysical data, feature engineering, and ensemble models.

This is the projects where i have trained a model by applying machine learning concepts and after that i have developed a fastAPI based REST backend to expose the trained ML model and applied pydantic schema for validation and for adding UI/UX i have used stramlit framework to this frontend part
Interpretable machine learning framework for designing Nb-Si based ultra-high temperature alloys with enhanced fracture toughness (>20 MPam^1/2)

Hi, I am Azka Muzaki, I am a dedicated with a passion for Machine Learning and AI, I have worked on various projects involving the development of Machine Learning, Deep Learning. I have strong skills in programming languages such as Python and C++, and am familiar with frameworks such as PyTorch & Tensorflow
A pipeline framework for developing video and image processing application. Supports multiple GPUs and Machine Learning tooklits

Machine learning framework for text quality assessment combining classical metrics with LLM-based evaluation. Two dataset are also released: a curated 150 excerpts dataset with human validated, gold-standard annotation and a 5995 automatically labelled, unvalidated silver dataset.
Atlantic: Automated Data Preprocessing Framework for Machine Learning
A machine learning framework for detecting phishing attacks across Email, SMS, and malicious URLs using a unified Random Forest classifier and signal-preserving NLP.

A unified machine learning framework for dyslexia detection using eye-tracking data from both children and adults. The repository benchmarks supervised and unsupervised models to evaluate cross-age and cross-dataset generalization.

The project aims to develop a comphrensive framework for understanding and analysing the behavioral patterns of individuals. This project will utilize various methods, including observational techniques, psychological assessments, and advanced technologies like machine learning and AI, to predict behavirol changes.
A generalized hybrid machine learning and optimization framework for market return prediction under risk constraints.

A decentralized dual-layer Sybil attack detection framework for RSU-less VANETs using machine learning-based behavioral analysis and cooperative Proof-of-Location verification on SUMOVeins-generated vehicular data.

This repository contains the code and simulation framework used in the paper:      Comparing Optimal Transport and Machine Learning Approaches for Data Merging Under Missing Covariate Scenarios: Application to Clinical Research
A comprehensive tabular data synthesis framework for automated machine learning, featuring advanced genetic algorithms and hyperparameter optimization for generating high-quality synthetic datasets.

C2-Traffic-Analysis-Framework A network simulation tool that generates mixed benign and malicious Command-and-Control (C2) traffic. It utilizes statistical analysis and Machine Learning (Isolation Forest) to detect stealthy, jittered beaconing channels amidst chaotic human web browsing noise.

This Python package  provides a robust framework to automatically train, evaluate, and visualize multiple machine learning models for both Classification and Regression problems.  It includes features for automatic best model recommendation, colorful confusion matrices, and comprehensive performance plots.
Machine learning framework to assess climate-driven risk of Salmonella contamination in poultry using lagged meteorological variables (France case study)

This project demonstrates a complete machine learning pipeline, from model development to deployment, emphasizing practical usability and clear visualization. It serves as a reference for applying machine learning techniques to tabular healthcare data and for deploying models using lightweight web frameworks such as Streamlit.

This project represents a comprehensive Automated Blood Cancer Detection System that integrated with ResNet50 for feature extraction from microscopic 5000 blood cell images and classified with 5 Machine Learning Classifiers like Logistic Regression, SVM, Random Forest, XGBoost, K-Means(k=5), and 1 object detection framework like YOLOv8.

A data-driven personal finance analytics system that calculates income tax liability under the Indian tax framework, assesses financial health using key indicators, and predicts financial stress levels with explainable insights. Built as an educational decision-support tool using Python, FastAPI, and machine learning techniques.
